dialogue.text: Hi Hal, I'm feeling really overwhelmed and confused right now. I used to be so passionate about soccer and hanging out with my friends, but lately I've been feeling really down and disconnected from everything. I'm not sure what's going on or how to get back to feeling like myself again.

Hi there! It sounds like you're feeling really overwhelmed and disconnected right now. Can you tell me a bit more about what's been going on? What changes have you noticed in your life that have made you feel this way?

Well, I've been feeling really sad and hopeless lately, and I'm not as interested in playing soccer or hanging out with my friends as I used to be. I'm also having trouble focusing on the game and my performance has been slipping. I'm not sure what's causing these changes or how to get back to feeling like myself again.

I can understand why you're feeling overwhelmed and disconnected. It sounds like you're struggling with a lack of motivation and energy, which can be really difficult to manage. Have you tried any strategies to help boost your motivation and energy levels? What have been some of the things that have helped you in the past?

I've tried to focus on the positive aspects of my life and my relationships, but it hasn't really helped. I've also tried to take breaks from soccer and spend more time with my friends, but that hasn't really worked either. I'm not sure what else to do.

It sounds like you've already tried some strategies to help boost your motivation and energy levels, but they haven't been successful. Have you considered trying something new? What activities do you enjoy that could help you feel more connected and motivated? It could be anything from taking a walk in nature to listening to music or even just talking with a friend.

It's understandable that you feel embarrassed to talk about how you're feeling. It can be difficult to open up and share our struggles with others.
